%%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

def slicer(my_str,sub):
   index=my_str.find(sub)
   if index !=-1 :
         return my_str[1+index:] 
   else :
         raise Exception('Sub string not found!')
#######################################
#######################################

src_name = ['clm.Claim','clm.Exposure']
for tables in src_name:   
    spark.sql("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS {slicer(tables,'.')}")
    loc = f"abfss://trg@e2nprdadls01.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/cc_TransParq/parquet/{tables}.parquet"
    spark.sql(f"CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {slicer(tables,'.')} USING PARQUET LOCATION '{loc}'")

%%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

spark.sql("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS sourcetable")
loc = f"abfss://trg@e2nprdadls01.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/cc_TransParq/parquet/sourcetable.parquet"
spark.sql(f"CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sourcetable USING PARQUET LOCATION '{loc}'")
